Package kin.dyn.closed

Class ClosedChain

java.lang.Object
kin.dyn.closed.ClosedChain
public class ClosedChain
extends java.lang.Object
The dynamic representation of a closed chain.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    ClosedChain​(ClosedChain otherChain, java.util.HashMap<Component,​Component> map)
    Create a dynamic representation of a closed chain from another dynamic chain.
    ClosedChain​(ClosedChainModel closedChainModel, java.util.HashMap<ComponentModel,​Component> map)
    Create a dynamic representation of a closed chain from a model.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    double[] currentUnificationPosition()
    Get the current unification point's position in world coordinates.
    void determinePassiveElements()
    Find out the passive elements parameters (angles or length) to fullfil the unification requirement.

  • Constructor Details

    • ClosedChain

      public ClosedChain​(ClosedChainModel closedChainModel, java.util.HashMap<ComponentModel,​Component> map)
      Create a dynamic representation of a closed chain from a model.
      Parameters:
      closedChainModel - closed chain model
      map - maps all model components to dynamic components

    • ClosedChain

      public ClosedChain​(ClosedChain otherChain, java.util.HashMap<Component,​Component> map)
      Create a dynamic representation of a closed chain from another dynamic chain.
      Parameters:
      otherChain - other dynamic chain element
      map - map between orginal and cloned components, the caller has to pass an empty HashMap

  • Method Details

    • determinePassiveElements

      public void determinePassiveElements()
      Find out the passive elements parameters (angles or length) to fullfil the unification requirement.

    • currentUnificationPosition

      public double[] currentUnificationPosition()
      Get the current unification point's position in world coordinates.
      Returns:
      array of 3 with x, y, z
